verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after they had come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"Moreover let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> in its appointed <S%H4150>season.<s%>

On the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H2320>month,<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it in its appointed <S%H4150>season<s%>â€”according to all its <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and according to all its <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> you shall keep <S%H6213>it.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they should <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover.<s%>

They <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6153>month,<s%> at evening, in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%> According to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did.<s%>

There were certain <S%H582>men,<s%> who were <S%H2931>unclean<s%> because of the dead <S%H5315>body<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and they <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> on that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H1992>Those<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2931>him,<s%> "We are unclean because of the dead <S%H5315>body<s%> of a <S%H120>man.<s%> Why are we kept <S%H1639>back,<s%> that we may not <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in its appointed <S%H4150>season<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H5975>them,<s%> "Wait, that I may <S%H8085>hear<s%> what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will command concerning <S%H6680>you.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Say<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376><s%> 'If any <S%H376>man<s%> of you or of your <S%H1755>generations<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by reason of a dead <S%H5315>body,<s%> or is on a <S%H1870>journey<s%> far <S%H7350>away,<s%> he shall still <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

In the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> at <S%H6153>evening<s%> they shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> <S%H398>it;<s%> they shall eat it with unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> and bitter <S%H4844>herbs.<s%>

They shall <S%H7604>leave<s%> none of it until the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> nor <S%H7665>break<s%> a <S%H6106>bone<s%> of <S%H2708>it.<s%> According to all the statute of the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> they shall keep <S%H6213>it.<s%>

But the <S%H376>man<s%> who is <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and is not on a <S%H1870>journey,<s%> and <S%H2308>fails<s%> to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people.<s%> Because he <S%H7126>didn't<s%> offer the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in its appointed <S%H4150>season,<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

<S%H1616><s%>"'If a foreigner <S%H1481>lives<s%> among <S%H6213>you,<s%> and desires to keep the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> according to the <S%H2708>statute<s%> of the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> and according to its <S%H2708>ordinance,<s%> so shall he <S%H6213>do.<s%> You shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2708>statute,<s%> both for the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> and for him who is <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>'"

On the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was raised <S%H6965>up,<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> even the <S%H4908>Tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>Testimony:<s%> and at <S%H6153>evening<s%> it was over the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> as it were the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> until <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
So it was <S%H8548>continually.<s%> The <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H4758>it,<s%> and the appearance of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

<S%H6310>Whenever<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> from over the <S%H168>Tent,<s%> then <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled;<s%> and in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>remained,<s%> there the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>encamped.<s%>

At the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled,<s%> and at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> they <S%H2583>encamped.<s%> As long <S%H3117>as<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>remained<s%> on the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> they remained <S%H2583>encamped.<s%>

When the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H748>stayed<s%> on the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4931>command,<s%> and <S%H5265>didn't<s%> travel.

<S%H3426>Sometimes<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> on the <S%H4908>tabernacle;<s%> then according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> they remained <S%H2583>encamped,<s%> and according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> they <S%H5265>traveled.<s%>

<S%H3426>Sometimes<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was from <S%H6153>evening<s%> until <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> they <S%H5265>traveled:<s%> or by <S%H3119>day<s%> and by <S%H3915>night,<s%> when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up,<s%> they <S%H5265>traveled.<s%>

Whether it was two <S%H3117>days,<s%> or a <S%H2320>month,<s%> or a <S%H3117>year<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H748>stayed<s%> on the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H7931>remaining<s%> on <S%H1121>it,<s%> the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> remained <S%H2583>encamped,<s%> and <S%H5265>didn't<s%> travel; but when it was taken <S%H5927>up,<s%> they <S%H5265>traveled.<s%>

At the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> they <S%H2583>encamped,<s%> and at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> they <S%H5265>traveled.<s%> They <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4931>command,<s%> at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
